songs.title: Ride
songs.lyrics:
I'm gonna rock this place like outer space
Give you something that you never had
I'm gonna paint my nails
And style my hair
And take me a strawberry bubble bath

I'm gonna speak my mind
Each time I find
That I got somethin' to say
I'm gonna jump around
And paint this town
Now let me hear you say:
HEY

Take me, take me down, take me down
(Do you wanna ride?)
Ride
Now follow, follow me now, follow me now
(Do you wanna ride?)
Ride

Turn it up
